title: Recursive Fractal Trees
description: In this coding challenge, I'll implement fractal trees with recursion in p5.js. This is the first part of a series on algorithmic botany.

codeExamples.title: Recursive Fractal Tree
codeExamples.description: This sketch codes a fractal tree with recursion.

links.title: Algorithmic Botany
links.description: The website of the Biological Modeling and Visualization research group in the Department of Computer Science at the University of Calgary.

links.title: My NOC class on Kadenze
links.description: This class focuses on the programming strategies and techniques behind computer simulations of natural systems.

links.title: Algorithmic Botany Track
links.description: This side track explores patterns found in nature. We'll cover how to simulate growing plants, flowers, and trees in p5.js and Processing.

links.title: Live Stream Archive #40
links.description: Live Stream Tree Generation with Different Algorithms
